SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.splendorclient.model.tokens

Class TokenPile

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.splendorclient.model.tokens.TokenPile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, Observer, Iterable<Token>
public class TokenPile extends Object implements Iterable<Token>, Observable, Observer
Represents a Splendor Token Pile with tokens and type. Observes itself, so that grabbing tokens and buying cards messages can be relayed between the board and the user inventory Observed by TokenPileView to update the counter Observed by TotalAssetCountView to update the counter
